alert.note: Alert for Laclede (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 03 at 1:38PM CST until March 07 at 8:29AM CST by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM CST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of southwest Missouri, including the following county, Laclede. * WHEN...Until 300 PM CST. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 137 PM CST, The Department of Transportation reported flooded roadways due to heavy rainfall received earlier today across the warned area. - This includes the following low water crossings... Dry Auglaize Creek at Highway BB, North Cobb Creek at Ripley Drive, Mountain Creek at Kinfolk Road, Bear Creek at Highway FF, North Cobb Creek at Highway B, Osage Fork at Highway J and Osage Fork at Auburn Road. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Western Fort Leonard Wood, Lebanon, Richland, Conway, Morgan, Phillipsburg, Stoutland, Bennett Springs, Twin Bridges, Sleeper, Dry Knob, Falcon, Eldridge, Competition, Lynchburg and Bennett Spring State Park. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Many flood deaths occur in vehicles.
